data.title: Anyone know that the Olivia Newton-John was Max Born's granddaughter?
data.meta_description:
https://www.washingtonpost.com/obituaries/2022/08/08/olivia-Newton-john-grease-singer-dies/

Olivia Newton-John was born in Cambridge, England, on Sept. 26...
data.meta_site_name: Physics Forums: Science Discussion, Homework Help, Articles

Aug 9, 2022

#1

swampwiz

571

83

https://www.washingtonpost.com/obituaries/2022/08/08/olivia-Newton-john-grease-singer-dies/

Olivia Newton-John was born in Cambridge, England, on Sept. 26, 1948. Her mother, the former Irene Born, was the daughter of the Nobel Prize-winning German-Jewish physicist Max Born, who had fled to England during Hitler’s rise.

Aug 9, 2022

No. Did not even know ONJ was of German or Ashkenaz descent though my daughter was her major fan. I should ask my elder sister, our family genealogy hobbyist, of any known ties to Max Born.

I knew that.

Max was for a time a colleague of Albert Einstein in the University of Berlin department of physics. They remained pen pals.
